issue.title: Qt5: Attempt to set a screen on a child window

content.raw:
I happened to have the same warnings,
It turns out that these warnings -aside from the first two- disappear when I'm not connecting my second screen, and instead this error appears
```
#!c++

 [Err] [Scene.cc:2840] Light [sun] not found. Use topic ~/factory/light to spawn a new light.
```
according to this stackoverflow post there is still some qt4 code that need to be migrated to qt5.
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/33545006/qt5-attempt-to-set-a-screen-on-a-child-window-many-runtime-warning-messages

according to this stackoverflow post there is still some qt4 code that need to be migrated to qt5. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/33545006/qt5-attempt-to-set-a-screen-on-a-child-window-many-runtime-warning-messages
